list.title: BaseBillboard#_handler
list.description: Handler that stores and renders this billboard object.

list.title: BaseBillboard#_isReady
list.description: An indication that the object is ready to draw

list.title: BaseBillboard#_offset
list.description: Billboard center screen space offset. Where x,y - screen space offset and z - depth offset.

list.title: BaseBillboard#setColor
list.description: Sets RGBA color. Each channel from 0.0 to 1.0.

list.title: BaseBillboard#setColor4v
list.description: Sets RGBA color. Each channel from 0.0 to 1.0.

list.title: BaseBillboard#setRotation
list.description: Sets billboard screen space rotation in radians.

list.title: BaseNode#getNodeByName
list.description: Gets node by name in the current.

list.title: Box#setFromBoundsArr
list.description: Sets bounding box coordinates by the bounds array.

list.title: Box#setFromExtent
list.description: Sets bounding box coordinates by ellipsoid geodetic extend.

list.title: Camera#getInverseProjectionViewMatrix
list.description: Returns inverse projection and model matrix product.

list.title: Camera#pitch
list.description: Pitch the camera to the angle in degrees

list.title: Camera#project
list.description: Gets projected 3d point to the 2d screen coordinates

list.title: Camera#projectedSize
list.description: Gets 3d size factor. Uses in LOD distance calculation.

list.title: Camera#roll
list.description: Roll the camera to the angle in degrees

list.title: Camera#rotateHorizontal
list.description: Rotates camera around center point by horizontal.

list.title: Camera#rotateVertical
list.description: Rotates camera around center point by vecrtical.

list.title: Camera#slide
list.description: Slides camera to vector d - (du, dv, dn)

list.title: Camera#unproject
list.description: Returns normal vector direction to to the unprojected screen point from camera eye

list.title: Camera#yaw
list.description: Yaw the camera to the angle in degrees

list.title: CanvasTiles#_exec
list.description: Loads material image and apply it to the planet segment.

list.title: CanvasTiles#_pendingsQueue
list.description: Tile pending queue that waiting for create.

list.title: Control#onactivate
list.description: Control activation function have to be overriden.

list.title: Control#onadd
list.description: Control renderer assigning function have to be overriden.

list.title: Control#ondeactivate
list.description: Control deactivation function have to be overriden.

list.title: Control#oninit
list.description: Control initialization function have to be overriden.

list.title: Control#onremove
list.description: Control remove function have to be overriden.

list.title: DateToTAI
list.description: Converts javascript date to the atomic(TAI) julian date.

list.title: DateToUTC
list.description: Converts javascript date to the universal(UTC) julian date.

list.title: EARTH_GRAVITATIONAL_PARAMETER
list.description: Earth gravitational parameter product of gravitational constant G and the mass M of the Earth.

list.title: Ellipsoid#direct
list.description: Calculates the destination point given start point lat / lon, azimuth(deg) and distance (m). Source: http://movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong-vincenty-direct.html and optimized / cleaned up by Mathias Bynens http://mathiasbynens.be/ Based on the Vincenty direct formula by T. Vincenty, “Direct and Inverse Solutions of Geodesics on the Ellipsoid with application of nested equations”, Survey Review, vol XXII no 176, 1975 http://www.ngs.noaa.gov/PUBS_LIB/inverse.pdf

list.title: Ellipsoid#geodeticToCartesian
list.description: Gets cartesian ECEF from Wgs84 geodetic coordinates.

list.title: Ellipsoid#getGreatCircleDestination
list.description: Calculates the destination point given start point lat / lon, azimuth(deg) and distance (m). Source: http://movable-type.co.uk/scripts/latlong-vincenty-direct.html and optimized / cleaned up by Mathias Bynens http://mathiasbynens.be/ Based on the Vincenty direct formula by T. Vincenty, “Direct and Inverse Solutions of Geodesics on the Ellipsoid with application of nested equations”, Survey Review, vol XXII no 176, 1975 http://www.ngs.noaa.gov/PUBS_LIB/inverse.pdf

list.title: Ellipsoid#getIntermediatePointOnGreatCircle
list.description: Returns the point at given fraction between two points on the great circle.

list.title: Ellipsoid#hitRay
list.description: Returns cartesian coordinates of the intersection of a ray and an ellipsoid. If the ray doesn't hit ellipsoid returns null.

list.title: Ellipsoid#lonLatToCartesian
list.description: Calculate cartesian coordinates by its ECEF geodetic coordinates.

list.title: Ellipsoid#lonLatToCartesianRes
list.description: Calculate cartesian coordinates by its ECEF geodetic coordinates.

list.title: Ellipsoid#projToSurface
list.description: Gets Wgs84 geodetic coordinates from cartesian ECEF.

list.title: Ellipsoid#rhumbDistanceTo
list.description: Returns the distance travelling from ‘this’ point to destination point along a rhumb line.

list.title: EmptyTerrain#maxZoom
list.description: Maximal z-index value for segment elevation data handling.

list.title: EmptyTerrain#minZoom
list.description: Minimal z-index value for segment elevation data handling.

list.title: EmptyTerrain#plainGridSize
list.description: Elevation grid size. Currend is 2x2 is the smallest grid size.

list.title: Entity#_entityCollection
list.description: Entity collection that this entity belongs to.

list.title: Entity#_setCartesian3vSilent
list.description: Sets entity cartesian position without event dispatching.

list.title: Entity#addTo
list.description: Adds current entity into the specified entity collection.

list.title: Entity#remove
list.description: Removes current entity from collection and layer.

list.title: Entity#setLonLat
list.description: Sets geodetic coordinates of the entity point object.

list.title: Entity#setLonLat2
list.description: Sets geodetic coordinates of the entity point object.

list.title: Entity#setPickingColor
list.description: Appends entity items(billboard, label etc.) picking color.

list.title: EntityCollection#add
list.description: Adds entity to the collection and returns collection.

list.title: EntityCollection#addEntities
list.description: Adds entities array to the collection and returns collection.

list.title: EntityCollection#belongs
list.description: Returns true if the entity belongs this collection, otherwise returns false.

list.title: EntityCollection#bindRenderNode
list.description: This function is called in the RenderNode assign function.

list.title: EntityCollection#clear
list.description: Removes all entities from collection and clear handlers.

list.title: EntityCollection#createPickingColors
list.description: Creates or refresh collected entities picking color.

list.title: EntityCollection#polygonOffsetUnits
list.description: Specifies the scale Units for gl.polygonOffset function to calculate depth values, 0.0 is default.

list.title: EntityCollection#reindexEntitiesArray
list.description: Refresh collected entities indexes from startIndex entitytes collection array position.

list.title: EntityCollection#scaleByDistance
list.description: First index - near distance to the entity, after entity becomes full scale. Second index - far distance to the entity, when entity becomes zero scale. Third index - far distance to the entity, when entity becomes invisible.

list.title: Events#_stamp
list.description: Returns true if event callback has stamped.

list.title: Events#off
list.description: Stop listening event name with specified callback function.

list.title: Events#registerNames
list.description: Function that creates event object properties that would be dispatched.

list.title: Extent#clone
list.description: Creates clone instance of the current extent.

list.title: Extent#forwardMercator
list.description: Converts extent coordinates to mercator projection coordinates.

list.title: Extent#getCartesianBounds
list.description: Gets cartesian bounding bounds of the current ellipsoid.

list.title: Extent#getCenter
list.description: Gets the center coordinate of the extent.

list.title: Extent#inverseMercator
list.description: Converts extent coordinates from mercator projection to degrees.

list.title: Extent#overlaps
list.description: Returns true if two extent overlap each other.

list.title: Extent#setByCoordinates
list.description: Sets current bounding extent object by coordinate array.

list.title: Extent.NORTH_POLE_DEG
list.description: Degrees extent from north mercator limit to north pole.

list.title: Extent.SOUTH_POLE_DEG
list.description: Degrees extent from south pole to south mercator limit.

list.title: Extent.createByCoordinates
list.description: Creates bound extent instance by coordinate array.

list.title: Extent.createByCoordinatesArr
list.description: Creates bound extent instance by coordinate array.

list.title: Extent.createFromArray
list.description: Creates extent instance from values in array.

list.title: Extent.fromTile
list.description: Creates extent by meractor grid tile coordinates.

list.title: Framebuffer#getImage
list.description: Gets JavaScript image object that framebuffer has drawn.

list.title: Framebuffer#readPixels
list.description: Gets pixel RBGA color from framebuffer by coordinates.

list.title: Frustum#containsBox
list.description: Returns true if the frustum contains a bounding box.

list.title: Frustum#containsPoint
list.description: Returns true if a point in the frustum.

list.title: Frustum#containsSphere
list.description: Returns true if the frustum contains a bonding sphere.

list.title: Frustum#containsSphere2
list.description: Returns true if the frustum contains a bonding sphere.

list.title: Frustum#containsSphereBottomExc
list.description: Returns true if the frustum contains a bonding sphere, but bottom plane exclude.

list.title: GeoImage#loadMaterial
list.description: Loads planet segment material. In this case - GeoImage source image.

list.title: GeoObject#_entity
list.description: Entity instance that holds this geo object.

list.title: GeoVideo#_createSourceTexture
list.description: Creates or refresh source video GL texture.

list.title: GeoVideo#loadMaterial
list.description: Loads planet segment material. In this case - GeoImage source video.

list.title: GlobusTerrain#_createHeights
list.description: Converts loaded data to segment elevation data type(columr major elevation data array in meters)

list.title: GlobusTerrain#gridSizeByZoom
list.description: Array of segment triangulation grid sizes where array index agreed to the segment zoom index.

list.title: GlobusTerrain#setUrlRewriteCallback
list.description: Sets url rewrite callback, used for custom url rewriting for every tile laoding.

list.title: Handler#extensions
list.description: Current WebGL extensions. Becomes here after context initialization.

list.title: Handler#isWebGl2
list.description: Check is gl context type equals webgl2

list.title: Handler.getContext
list.description: Returns a drawing context on the canvas, or null if the context identifier is not supported.

list.title: Handler.getExtension
list.description: The return value is null if the extension is not supported, or an extension object otherwise.

list.title: ImageCanvas#openImage
list.description: Open canvas image in the new window.

list.title: J2000_OBLIQUITY
list.description: Angle between J2000 mean equator and the ecliptic plane. 23 deg 26' 21".448 (Seidelmann, Explanatory Supplement to the Astronomical Almanac (1992), eqn 3.222-1.

list.title: KML#_convertCoordonatesIntoEntities
list.description: Creates billboards or polylines from array of lonlat.

list.title: Label#setAlign
list.description: Sets label text align. Could be center, left or right. Left is default.

list.title: Label#setOutline
list.description: Sets text outline border size. Where 0 - is no outline and 1 - is the maximum outline size.

list.title: Label#setOutlineOpacity
list.description: Sets outline opacity. Actually outline color alpha value.

list.title: Layer#_correctFullExtent
list.description: Special correction of the whole globe extent.

list.title: Layer#_pickingColor
list.description: Layer picking color. Assign when added to the planet.

list.title: Layer#bringToFront
list.description: Set zIndex to the maximal value depend on other layers on the planet.

list.title: Layer#hasImageryTiles
list.description: Returns true if a layer has imagery tiles.

list.title: Layer#isBaseLayer
list.description: Returns true if the layer is a base.

list.title: Layer#maxZoom
list.description: Maximal zoom level when layer is visibile.

list.title: Layer#minZoom
list.description: Minimal zoom level when layer is visibile.

list.title: LayerAnimation#_setCurrentIndexAsync
list.description: Function sets layer index visible. If the layer is idle (all visible tiles loaded), sets opacity to one, otherwise to ZERO it means that when all visible tiles will be loaded the opacity becomes ONE. So, previous layer remains non transparent (opacity = 1) till current layer is loading.

list.title: LightSource#addTo
list.description: Adds current light to the render node scene.

list.title: LightSource#clone
list.description: Creates clone of the current light object.

list.title: LightSource#getPosition
list.description: Returns light source position, or if it is a directional type sets light direction vector.

list.title: LightSource#setActive
list.description: Set light activity. If activity is false the light doesn't shine.

list.title: LightSource#setPosition
list.description: Set light source position, or if it is a directional type sets light direction vector.

list.title: LightSource#setPosition3v
list.description: Set light source position, or if it is a directional type sets light direction vector.

list.title: MAX_NODES
list.description: Maximum created nodes count. The more nodes count the more memory usage.

list.title: Mat3#_m
list.description: A 3x3 matrix, indexable as a column-major order array.

list.title: Mat4#_m
list.description: A 4x4 matrix, indexable as a column-major order array.

list.title: Mat4#eulerToMatrix
list.description: Sets current rotation matrix by euler's angles.

list.title: Mat4#inverseTo
list.description: Creates an inversed matrix of the current.

list.title: Mat4#rotate
list.description: Rotate currrent matrix around the aligned axis and angle.

list.title: Mat4#rotateBetweenVectors
list.description: Gets the rotation matrix from one vector to another.

list.title: Mat4#scale
list.description: Scale current matrix to the vector values.

list.title: Mat4#setRotation
list.description: Sets current rotation matrix around the aligned axis and angle.

list.title: Mat4#toInverseMatrix3
list.description: Creates an inversed 3x3 matrix of the current.

list.title: Mat4#translate
list.description: Add translation vector to the current matrix.

list.title: Mat4#transposeTo
list.description: Creates a trasposed matrix of the current.

list.title: NOPSORD
list.description: Neighbos's opside array order. For example NW node by E side array index is 0, SE node by S side is 1.

list.title: Node#addToRender
list.description: Seraching for neighbours and pickup current node to render processing.

list.title: Node#getEqualNeighbor
list.description: Returns the same deep existent neighbour node.

list.title: OPPART
list.description: Neighbor's oposite part. For example oposite side on the east neighbor side is: [S][SE] = NE

list.title: PARTOFFSET
list.description: Gets segment part left to right or up to downo ffset against neighbour side. Where 0 - no offset 1 - half segment size offset.

list.title: Planet#SLICE_SIZE
list.description: Segment multiple textures size.(4 - convinient value for the most devices)

list.title: Planet#_heightFactor
list.description: Height scale factor. 1 - is normal elevation scale.

list.title: Planet#_indexesCache
list.description: Precomputed indexes array for differrent grid size segments.

list.title: Planet#_textureCoordsBufferCache
list.description: Precomputed texture coordinates buffers for differrent grid size segments.

list.title: Planet#_visibleNodes
list.description: Current visible mercator segments tree nodes array.

list.title: Planet#_visibleNodesNorth
list.description: Current visible north pole nodes tree nodes array.

list.title: Planet#_visibleNodesSouth
list.description: Current visible south pole nodes tree nodes array.

list.title: Planet#addControl
list.description: Add the given control to the renderer of the planet scene.

list.title: Planet#addControls
list.description: Add the given controls array to the renderer of the planet.

list.title: Planet#addLayer
list.description: Adds the given layer to the planet.

list.title: Planet#addLayers
list.description: Adds the given layers array to the planet.

list.title: Planet#baseLayer
list.description: There is only one base layer on the globe when layer.isBaseLayer is true.

list.title: Planet#createDefaultTextures
list.description: Creates default textures first for nirth pole and whole globe and second for south pole.

list.title: Planet#flyExtent
list.description: Fly camera to the planet geographical extent.

list.title: Planet#flyLonLat
list.description: Fly camera to the new geographical position.

list.title: Planet#getCartesianFromMouseTerrain
list.description: Returns 3d cartesian coordinates on the relief planet by mouse cursor position or null if mouse cursor is outside the planet.

list.title: Planet#getCartesianFromPixelEllipsoid
list.description: Returns 2d screen coordanates projection point to the planet ellipsoid 3d coordinates.

list.title: Planet#getCartesianFromPixelTerrain
list.description: Returns 3d cartesian coordinates on the relief planet by 2d screen coordinates. position or null if input coordinates is outside the planet.

list.title: Planet#getDistanceFromPixel
list.description: Returns distance from active camera to the the relief planet coordinates unprojected by 2d screen coordinates, or null if screen coordinates outside the planet. If screen coordinates inside the planet but relief is not exists in the point than function returns distance to the planet ellipsoid.

list.title: Planet#getDistanceFromPixelEllipsoid
list.description: Returns distance from active camera to the the planet ellipsoid coordinates unprojected by 2d screen coordinates, or null if screen coordinates outside the planet.

list.title: Planet#getLayers
list.description: Get the collection of layers associated with this planet.

list.title: Planet#getLonLatFromPixelEllipsoid
list.description: Returns 2d screen coordanates projection point to the planet ellipsoid geographical coordinates.

list.title: Planet#getLonLatFromPixelTerrain
list.description: Returns geographical coordinates on the relief planet by 2d screen coordinates. position or null if input coordinates is outside the planet.

list.title: Planet#getPixelFromCartesian
list.description: Returns projected 2d screen coordinates by 3d cartesian coordinates.

list.title: Planet#getPixelFromLonLat
list.description: Returns projected 2d screen coordinates by geographical coordinates.

list.title: Planet#getRayIntersectionEllipsoid
list.description: Returns ray vector hit ellipsoid coordinates. If the ray doesn't hit ellipsoit returns null.

list.title: Planet#maxCurrZoom
list.description: Current visible maximal zoom index planet segment.

list.title: Planet#minCurrZoom
list.description: Current visible minimal zoom index planet segment.

list.title: Planet#mousePositionOnEarth
list.description: Screen mouse pointer projected to planet cartesian position.

list.title: Planet#removeLayer
list.description: Removes the given layer from the planet.

list.title: Planet#setBaseLayer
list.description: Sets base layer coverage to the planet.

list.title: Planet#viewExtent
list.description: Sets camera to the planet geographical extent.

list.title: Planet#viewExtentArr
list.description: Sets camera to the planet geographical extent.

list.title: Planet#viewLonLat
list.description: Sets camera to the planet geographical position.

list.title: PlanetCamera#checkFly
list.description: Prepare camera to the frame. Used in render node frame function.

list.title: PlanetCamera#maxAltitude
list.description: Maximal alltitude that camera can reach over the globe.

list.title: PlanetCamera#minAltitude
list.description: Minimal alltitude that camera can reach over the terrain.

list.title: PlanetCamera#rotateDown
list.description: Rotates around planet to the south pole.

list.title: PlanetCamera#rotateUp
list.description: Rotates around planet to the north pole.

list.title: PlanetCamera#setLonLat
list.description: Places camera to view to the geographical point.

list.title: Polyline#addPoint3v
list.description: Adds a new cartesian point in the end of the path.

list.title: Polyline#addPointLonLat
list.description: Adds a new geodetic point in the end of the path.

list.title: Polyline#appendPoint3v
list.description: Adds a new cartesian point in the end of the path in a last line segment.

list.title: Polyline.appendLineData3v
list.description: Appends to the line array new cartesian coordinates line data.

list.title: Polyline.appendLineDataLonLat
list.description: Appends to the line array new geodetic coordinates line data.

list.title: Polyline.appendPoint3v
list.description: Appends to the line new cartesian coordinates point data.

list.title: ProgramController#deactivate
list.description: Deactivate shader program. This is not necessary while activae function used.

list.title: ProgramController#set
list.description: Sets program uniforms and attributes values and return controller instance.

list.title: Quat#add
list.description: Computes the componentwise sum of two Quats.

list.title: Quat#dot
list.description: Computes the dot (scalar) product of two Quats.

list.title: Quat#getAxisAngle
list.description: Returns axis and angle of the current Quat.

list.title: Quat#getEulerAngles
list.description: Returns Euler's angles of the current Quat.

list.title: Quat#getMat3
list.description: Converts current Quat to the rotation 3x3 matrix.

list.title: Quat#getMat4
list.description: Converts current Quat to the rotation 4x4 matrix.

list.title: Quat#isZero
list.description: Returns true if the components are zero.

list.title: Quat#magnitude2
list.description: Computes a squared magnitude of the Quat.

list.title: Quat#scaleTo
list.description: Multiplies the provided Quat componentwise by the provided scalar.

list.title: Quat#setFromAxisAngle
list.description: Sets current Quat representing a rotation around an axis.

list.title: Quat#setFromMatrix4
list.description: Computes a Quat from the provided 4x4 matrix instance.

list.title: Quat#setIdentity
list.description: Set current Quat instance to identity Quat.

list.title: Quat#setLookRotation
list.description: Sets rotation with the given heading and up vectors.

list.title: Quat#slerp
list.description: Performs a spherical linear interpolation between two Quats.

list.title: Quat#sub
list.description: Computes the componentwise difference of two Quats.

list.title: Quat.axisAngleToQuat
list.description: Computes a Quat representing a rotation around an axis.

list.title: Quat.getLookAtSourceDest
list.description: Computes a Quat from from source point heading to the destination point.

list.title: Quat.getLookRotation
list.description: Computes a rotation from the given heading and up vector.

list.title: Quat.getRotationBetweenVectorsUp
list.description: Compute rotation between two vectors with around vector up for exactly opposite vectors. If vectors exaclty in the same direction than returns identity Quat.

list.title: Quat.xRotation
list.description: Returns a Quat represents rotation around X axis.

list.title: Quat.yRotation
list.description: Returns a Quat represents rotation around Y axis.

list.title: Quat.zRotation
list.description: Returns a Quat represents rotation around Z axis.

list.title: Ray#_handler
list.description: Handler that stores and renders this billboard object.

list.title: Ray#getPoint
list.description: Computes the point along the ray on the distance.

list.title: Ray#hitPlane
list.description: Gets a ray hit a plane result. If the ray cross the plane returns 1 - og.Ray.INSIDE otherwise returns 0 - og.Ray.OUTSIDE.

list.title: Ray#hitSphere
list.description: Returns a ray hit sphere coordiante. If there isn't hit returns null.

list.title: Rectangle#fit
list.description: Returns true if rectangle fits their size in width and height.

list.title: RenderNode#drawNode
list.description: Calls render frame node's callback. Used in renderer.

list.title: RenderNode#preDrawNode
list.description: Calls render frame node's callback. Used in renderer.

list.title: RenderNode#transformLights
list.description: IMPORTANT: This function have to be called manualy in each render node frame callback, before drawing scene geometry.

list.title: Renderer#addControl
list.description: Add the given control to the renderer.

list.title: Renderer#addControls
list.description: Add the given controls array to the planet node.

list.title: Renderer#addNodeBefore
list.description: Adds render node to the renderer before specific node.

list.title: Renderer#addNodes
list.description: Adds render nodes array to the renderer.

list.title: Renderer#billboardsTextureAtlas
list.description: Texture atlas for the billboards images. One atlas per node.

list.title: Renderer#div
list.description: Div element with WebGL canvas. Assigned in Globe class.

list.title: Renderer#enqueueEntityCollectionsToDraw
list.description: TODO: replace with cahce frendly linked list by bilboardHandler, label handler etc.

list.title: Renderer#events
list.description: Renderer events. Represents interface for setting events like mousemove, draw, keypress etc.

list.title: Renderer#fontAtlas
list.description: Texture font atlas for the font families and styles. One atlas per node.

list.title: Renderer#geoObjectsTextureAtlas
list.description: Texture atlas for the billboards images. One atlas per node.

list.title: Renderer#renderNodes
list.description: Render nodes store for the comfortable access by the node name.

list.title: RendererEvents#mouseState.leftButtonDoubleClick
list.description: Left mouse button has clicked twice now.

list.title: RendererEvents#mouseState.leftButtonUp
list.description: Left mouse button has stopped pushing down right now.

list.title: RendererEvents#mouseState.middleButtonDoubleClick
list.description: Middle mouse button has clicked twice now.

list.title: RendererEvents#mouseState.middleButtonUp
list.description: Middle mouse button has stopped pushing down right now.

list.title: RendererEvents#mouseState.rightButtonDoubleClick
list.description: Right mouse button has clicked twice now.

list.title: RendererEvents#mouseState.rightButtonUp
list.description: Right mouse button has stopped pushing down right now.

list.title: RendererEvents#touchState.doubleTouchRadius
list.description: Double touching responce radius in screen pixels.

list.title: SUN_GRAVITATIONAL_PARAMETER
list.description: Sun gravitational parameter product of gravitational constant G and the mass M of the Sun.

list.title: Segment#acceptForRendering
list.description: Returns that segment good for rendering with camera by current lod ratio.

list.title: Segment#createBoundsByExtent
list.description: Creates bound volumes by segment geographical extent.

list.title: Segment#createBoundsByExtent
list.description: Creates bound volumes by segment geographical extent.

list.title: Segment#elevationsNotExists
list.description: Terrain is not obtained or not exists on the server.

list.title: Segment#elevationsNotExists
list.description:
Keep plain elevation segment for rendering

'this.tileZoom <= this.planet.terrain.maxZoom' it means, that the segment is plain

list.title: Segment#getTerrainPoint
list.description: Returns distance from object to terrain coordinates and terrain point that calculates out in the res parameter.

list.title: Segment#getTerrainPoint
list.description: Returns distance from object to terrain coordinates and terrain point that calculates out in the res parameter.

list.title: Segment#initialized
list.description: Segment is ready to create plain vertices.

list.title: Segment#initialized
list.description: Segment is ready to create plain vertices.

list.title: Segment#parentNormalMapReady
list.description: Parent normal map is made allready(optimization parameter).

list.title: Segment#passReady
list.description: Means that tree passage reach the segment, and the segment terrain is ready.

list.title: Sphere#setFromBounds
list.description: Sets bounding sphere coordinates by the bounds array.

list.title: Sphere#setFromExtent
list.description: Sets bounding sphere coordinates by ellipsoid geodetic extend.

list.title: TAItoDate
list.description: Converts TAI julian date to the javascript date object.

list.title: TAItoTDB
list.description: Converts atomic time to barycentric dynamical time.

list.title: TAItoUTC
list.description: Converts atomic julian date(TAI) to the coordinated universal(UTC) julian date.

list.title: TextureAtlas#addImage
list.description: Adds image to the atlas and returns creted node with texture coordinates of the stored image.

list.title: TextureAtlas#assignHandler
list.description: Sets openglobus gl handler that creates gl texture.

list.title: TextureAtlas#loadImage
list.description: Asynchronous function that loads and creates image to the image cache, and call success callback when it's done.

list.title: TextureAtlas#nodes
list.description: Atlas nodes where input images store. It can be access by image.__nodeIndex.

list.title: UTCtoDate
list.description: Converts UTC julian date to the javascript date object.

list.title: UTCtoTAI
list.description: Converts coordinated universal(UTC) julian date to atomic(TAI) julian date.

list.title: Vec2#divA
list.description: Divide current vector's components to another. Results stores in the current vector object.

list.title: Vec2#equal
list.description: Compares with vector. Returns true if it equals another.

list.title: Vec2#mul
list.description: Multiply current vector object to another and returns new vector instance.

list.title: Vec2#mulA
list.description: Multiply current vector object to another and store result in the current instance.

list.title: Vec2#projToRay
list.description: Gets projected point coordinates of the current vector on the ray.

list.title: Vec2#slerp
list.description: Spherically interpolates between two vectors. Interpolates between current and v2 vector by amount t. The difference between this and linear interpolation (aka, "lerp") is that the vectors are treated as directions rather than points in space. The direction of the returned vector is interpolated by the angle and its magnitude is interpolated between the magnitudes of from and to.

list.title: Vec2#subA
list.description: Subtract vector from the current where results saved on the current instance.

list.title: Vec2.div
list.description: Returns vector components division product one to another.

list.title: Vec2.orthoNormalize
list.description: Makes vectors normalized and orthogonal to each other.

list.title: Vec2.proj_b_to_a
list.description: Get projection of the first vector to the second.

list.title: Vec3#div
list.description: Divide current vector's components to another and returns new vector instance.

list.title: Vec3#divA
list.description: Divide current vector's components to another. Results stores in the current vector object.

list.title: Vec3#equal
list.description: Compares with vector. Returns true if it equals another.

list.title: Vec3#getQuat
list.description: Converts vector's values to a quaternion object.

list.title: Vec3#getRotationTo
list.description: Gets the shortest arc quaternion to rotate this vector to the destination vector.

list.title: Vec3#isZero
list.description: Returns true if vector's values are zero.

list.title: Vec3#mul
list.description: Multiply current vector object to another and returns new vector instance.

list.title: Vec3#mulA
list.description: Multiply current vector object to another and store result in the current instance.

list.title: Vec3#projToRay
list.description: Gets projected point coordinates of the current vector on the ray.

list.title: Vec3#projToVec
list.description: Get projection of the first vector to the second.

list.title: Vec3#slerp
list.description: Spherically interpolates between two vectors. Interpolates between current and v2 vector by amount t. The difference between this and linear interpolation (aka, "lerp") is that the vectors are treated as directions rather than points in space. The direction of the returned vector is interpolated by the angle and its magnitude is interpolated between the magnitudes of from and to.

list.title: Vec3#smerp
list.description: Returns vector interpolation by v(t) = v1 * t + v2 * (1 - t)

list.title: Vec3.div
list.description: Returns vector components division product one to another.

list.title: Vec3.doubleToTwoFloat32Array
list.description: Separate 63 bit Vec3 to two Vec3 32 bit float values.

list.title: Vec3.doubleToTwoFloats
list.description: Separate 63 bit Vec3 to two Vec3 32 bit float values.

list.title: Vec3.noncollinear
list.description: Returns true if two vectors are non collinear.

list.title: Vec3.orthoNormalize
list.description: Makes vectors normalized and orthogonal to each other. Normalizes normal. Normalizes tangent and makes sure it is orthogonal to normal (that is, angle between them is 90 degrees).

list.title: Vec3.proj_b_to_a
list.description: Get projection of the first vector to the second.

list.title: Vec3.proj_b_to_plane
list.description: Get projection of the vector to plane where n - normal to the plane.

list.title: Vec4#affinity
list.description: Makes vector affinity. Thereby fourh component becomes to 1.0.

list.title: Vec4#equal
list.description: Compares with vector. Returns true if it equals another.

list.title: Vec4#getFrac
list.description: The vector fract function returns the vector of fractional parts of each value, i.e. x minus floor(x).

list.title: Vec4#getStep
list.description: Vector's edge function that returns vector where each component is 0.0 if it's smaller then edge and otherwise 1.0.

list.title: Vec4#isZero
list.description: Returns true if vector's values are zero.

list.title: Vector#_reindexEntitiesArray
list.description: Refresh collected entities indexes from startIndex entitytes collection array position.

list.title: Vector#insert
list.description: Adds entity to the layer in the index position.

list.title: Vector#polygonOffsetUnits
list.description: Specifies the scale Units for gl.polygonOffset function to calculate depth values, 0.0 is default.

list.title: Vector#relativeToGround
list.description: Sets vector data relative to the ground relief.

list.title: Vector#removeEntity
list.description: Remove entity from layer. TODO: memory leaks.

list.title: Vector#scaleByDistance
list.description: First index - near distance to the entity, after that entity becomes full scale. Second index - far distance to the entity, when entity becomes zero scale. Third index - far distance to the entity, when entity becomes invisible.

list.title: Vector#setEntities
list.description: Removes current entities from layer and adds new entities.

list.title: XYZ#maxNativeZoom
list.description: Maximal native zoom level when tiles are available.

list.title: XYZ#minNativeZoom
list.description: Minimal native zoom level when tiles are available.

list.title: XYZ#setUrlRewriteCallback
list.description: Sets url rewrite callback, used for custom url rewriting for every tile laoding.

list.title: __resizeTimeout
list.description: Represents high level WebGL context interface that starts WebGL handler working in real time.

list.title: getSunPosition
list.description: Returns Sun position in the geocentric coordinate system by the time.

list.title: module:og/Globe~Globe#fadeIn
list.description: Starts screen brightness fading in effect by the duration time.

list.title: module:og/Globe~Globe#fadeOut
list.description: Starts screen brightness fading out effect by the duration time.

list.title: module:og/Globe~Globe#renderer
list.description: Interface for the renderer context(events, input states, renderer nodes etc.)

list.title: module:og/math.frac
list.description: The fract function returns the fractional part of x, i.e. x minus floor(x).

list.title: module:og/math.isPowerOfTwo
list.description: Check the number is a power of two.

list.title: module:og/math.log
list.description: The log function returns the power to which the base value has to be raised to produce n.

list.title: module:og/math.mod
list.description: The modulo operation that also works for negative dividends.

list.title: module:og/math.negativePItoPI
list.description: Returns an angle in the range -Pi <= angle <= Pi which is equivalent to the provided angle.

list.title: module:og/math.nextHighestPowerOfTwo
list.description: Returns next value that is power of two.

list.title: module:og/math.randomi
list.description: Returns random integer number within the bounds.

list.title: module:og/math.slice
list.description: Returns a slice of linear interpolation t * (h1 - h0)

list.title: module:og/math.solve_iteration
list.description: Solve using iteration; terminate when error is below err or the maximum number of iterations is reached. Used in Euler's equation(see og.orbit) solving.

list.title: module:og/math.solve_iteration_fixed
list.description: Solve using iteration method and a fixed number of steps.

list.title: module:og/math.step
list.description: Returns 0.0 if x is smaller than edge and otherwise 1.0.

list.title: module:og/math.zeroTwoPI
list.description: Returns an angle in the range 0 <= angle <= 2Pi which is equivalent to the provided angle.

list.title: module:og/math/coder.decodeFloatFromRGBA
list.description: Decode RGBA vector to 32 bit float value.

list.title: module:og/math/coder.decodeFloatFromRGBAArr
list.description: Decode RGBA vector to 32 bit float value.

list.title: module:og/math/coder.doubleToTwoFloats
list.description: Separate 64 bit value to two 32 bit float values.

list.title: module:og/math/coder.doubleToTwoFloats2
list.description: Separate 64 bit value to two 32 bit float values.

list.title: module:og/math/coder.doubleToTwoFloatsV2
list.description: Separate 64 bit value to two 32 bit float values.

list.title: module:og/math/coder.encodeFloatToRGBA
list.description: Encode 32 bit float value to the RGBA vector.

list.title: module:og/mercator.forwardArray
list.description: Converts geodetic coordinate array to mercator coordinate array.

list.title: module:og/mercator.getTileX
list.description: Returns mercator map tile grid horizontal coordinate index by geodetic longitude and zoom level. Where top left corner of the grid is 0 coordinate index.

list.title: module:og/mercator.getTileY
list.description: Returns mercator map tile grid vertical coordinate index by geodetic latitude and zoom level. Where top left corner of the grid is 0 coordinate index.

list.title: module:og/utils/shared.binarySearch
list.description: Finds an item in a sorted array.

list.title: module:og/utils/shared.getMatrixSubArray
list.description: Returns triangle coordinate array from inside of the source triangle array.

list.title: module:og/utils/shared.getMatrixSubArrayBoundsExt
list.description: Returns two float32 triangle coordinate arrays from inside of the source triangle array.

list.title: module:og/utils/shared.htmlColorToRgb
list.description: Convert html color string to the RGB number vector.

list.title: module:og/utils/shared.htmlColorToRgba
list.description: Convert html color string to the RGBA number vector.

list.title: module:og/utils/shared.isUndef
list.description: Returns true if the object pointer is undefined.

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:add
list.description: Triggered when added to the render node.

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:entityadd
list.description: Triggered when new entity added to the collection.

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:entityremove
list.description: Triggered when entity removes from the collection.

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:ldown
list.description: Mouse left button is just pressed down(start pressing).

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:mdown
list.description: Mouse middle button is just pressed down(start pressing).

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:mouseenter
list.description: Triggered when mouse has entered over the entity.

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:mousemove
list.description: Triggered when mouse moves over the entity.

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:rdown
list.description: Mouse right button is just pressed down(start pressing).

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:remove
list.description: Triggered when removed from the render node.

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:touchenter
list.description: Triggered when touch enters over the entity.

list.title: og.EntityCollection#event:touchmove
list.description: Triggered when touch moves over the entity.

list.title: og.Layer#event:add
list.description: Triggered when layer has added to the planet.

list.title: og.Layer#event:ldown
list.description: Mouse left button is just pressed down(start pressing).

list.title: og.Layer#event:mdown
list.description: Mouse middle button is just pressed down(start pressing).

list.title: og.Layer#event:mouseenter
list.description: Triggered when mouse has entered over the layer.

list.title: og.Layer#event:mousemove
list.description: Triggered when mouse moves over the layer.

list.title: og.Layer#event:rdown
list.description: Mouse right button is just pressed down(start pressing).

list.title: og.Layer#event:remove
list.description: Triggered when layer has removed from the planet.

list.title: og.Layer#event:touchenter
list.description: Triggered when touch enters over the layer.

list.title: og.Layer#event:touchmove
list.description: Triggered when touching moves over the layer.

list.title: og.RendererEvents#event:draw
list.description: Triggered before scene frame is rendered(before render nodes).

list.title: og.RendererEvents#event:ldown
list.description: Mouse left button is just pressed down(start pressing).

list.title: og.RendererEvents#event:mdown
list.description: Mouse middle button is just pressed down(start pressing).

list.title: og.RendererEvents#event:postdraw
list.description: Triggered after scene frame is rendered(after render nodes).

list.title: og.RendererEvents#event:rdown
list.description: Mouse right button is just pressed down(start pressing).

list.title: og.layer.CanvasTiles#event:load
list.description: Triggered when current tile image has loaded before rendereing.

list.title: og.layer.CanvasTiles#event:loadend
list.description: Triggered when all tiles have loaded or loading has stopped.

list.title: og.layer.Vector#event:entityadd
list.description: Triggered when new entity added to the layer.

list.title: og.layer.Vector#event:entityremove
list.description: Triggered when entity removes from the collection.

list.title: og.layer.XYZ#event:load
list.description: Triggered when current tile image has loaded before rendereing.

list.title: og.layer.XYZ#event:loadend
list.description: Triggered when all tiles have loaded or loading has stopped.

list.title: og.scene.Planet#event:draw
list.description: Triggered before globe frame begins to render.

list.title: og.scene.Planet#event:layeradd
list.description: Triggered when layer has added to the planet.

list.title: og.scene.Planet#event:layerremove
list.description: Triggered when layer has removed from the planet.

list.title: og.terrain.GlobusTerrain#event:load
list.description: Triggered when current elevation tile has loaded but before rendereing.

list.title: og.terrain.GlobusTerrain#event:loadend
list.description: Triggered when all elevation tiles have loaded or loading has stopped.
